component.name: Blink
component.summary: Fully featured, easy to use SIP client

description.p:
Features:
Audio calls (Opus, G.722, G.711, Speex, GSM, ilBC codecs)
Video calls (HD H.264)
Multiple SIP accounts
Google contacts integration
Acoustic Echo Cancellation (the one that really works)
Multiparty audio and chat conference
Chat sessions (MSRP)
File Transfers (MSRP)
Screen Sharing (VNC over MSRP)
SIMPLE Presence (XCAP and RLS)
Contacts management (XCAP)
Voicemail notifications
Call history
Redial and Hold
ICE NAT traversal
sRTP encryption
Bonjour neighbours (MDNS protocol)
SIP server discovery (DNS NAPTR, SRV, A records)
